title: Question 24:
description: How to Yield Farm and Liquidity Mine?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
1. Stake Stablecoins (DAI/USDC/sUSD) and earn $BOND. 
2. Provide liquidity on Uniswap w/ earned $BOND and USDC. 
3. Get LP tokens & stake them on #BarnBridge. 
4. Earn $BOND rewards for staking LP tokens.
